abstract:
This is an extract from Nat Ofo, Amending the Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria 1999, 4 AFR. J. LEGAL STUD. 123, 136 n.39 (peer reviewed) (citing Textualist and Reply to Lawson).
[June 21, 2011]
title: Extract from Nat Ofo, Amending the Constitution of the Federal Republic of Nigeria 1999, African Journal of Legal Studies (2011) (peer reviewed), citing Lawson-Tillman Exchange
subject: law
